attributes.action: I am unemployed, receive not one penny in benefits
attributes.additional_details: I have applied for hundreds of jobs but get no replies. I am 64 years old so ageism is alive and well but ignored by the authorities so it is them that are breaking the law as well as the prospective employers. This endemic problem must be addressed immediately. I have been unemployed for nearly one year and I was paid jobseekers allowance for 6 months then NOTHING.
